title: National Guard patrol Union Station as Trump's DC crackdown expands
shortDescription: Around two dozen soldiers stood guard outside Washington, Union Station in Washington, D.C., on Aug. 14. They had little to do.

title: Setting the scene for Trump-Putin summit
shortDescription: Trump and Putin will try to broker a ceasefire to the Russia-Ukraine war at a military base in Anchorage, Alaska.

title: California to hold Nov. 4 election to re-draw House maps
shortDescription: California is the most populous state in the union and the only one with more seats in Congress than Texas.

title: DC homeless encampments clear out amid Trump crackdown
shortDescription: D.C. officials gave homeless residents notice to vacate their encampments as part of President Trump's push for them to leave the city.

title: New Pew survey finds 60% of Americans disapprove of Trump
shortDescription: The president's approval rating is down three points since June and nine points since shortly after his inauguration, when it stood at 47%.

title: Can Trump get a Ukraine peace deal with Putin? Here's what's at stake
shortDescription: Trump is betting a face-to-face meeting with Putin on Aug. 15 can help generate the breakthrough that has proven elusive in the peace talks.

title: Supreme Court declines to block age verification law for social media – for now
shortDescription: NetChoice, which represents Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and other sites, argues laws like Mississippi's violate social media users' privacy and First Amendment rights.

title: When is the Trump-Putin meeting? Schedule, location, subject of talks
shortDescription: The highly anticipated bilateral summit between the leaders of the U.S. and Russia is set for Aug. 15. Here's what to know.

title: Melania Trump threatens Hunter Biden with lawsuit for Epstein comments
shortDescription: First Lady Melania Trump has demanded that Hunter Biden retract recent comments linking her to convicted sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump says there's a chance his 'chess game' with Putin fails
shortDescription: President Trump said he hopes his upcoming meeting with Vladimir Putin will lead to a second meeting for Russia and Ukraine to "divvy up " land.

title: Hunter Biden drops F-bomb on Melania Trump's Epstein lawsuit threat
shortDescription: President Trump’s friendship with Epstein has dogged him since his first term in office.

title: Ivanka Trump could return to the White House for unusual reason
shortDescription: First daughter Ivanka Trump was once a prominent adviser to her father. Now, Dana White says she is helping plan a UFC event at the White House.

title: Trump eases commercial spaceflight regulations in win for SpaceX, Musk
shortDescription: SpaceX and Elon Musk just notched a significant win with President Donald Trump's latest executive order regarding commercial rocket launches.

title: Alaska prepares for Trump-Putin summit
shortDescription: Alaskan locals brace for Trump-Putin summit as hopes and doubts rise over Ukraine peace talks.

title: DC protests Trump’s crime crackdown
shortDescription: Protesters in Washington, D.C., push back against President Donald Trump’s crime crackdown and troop deployment.

title: Zelenskyy visits London as Ukraine braces for Trump-Putin meeting
shortDescription: Volodymyr Zelenskyy visited London on Thursday to shore up European support for efforts to prevent any agreement that would carve up Ukrainian land.

title: Failed GOP candidate jailed over gun attacks on Democrats' homes
shortDescription: A failed Republican candidate was jailed for contracting gunmen to carry out drive-by shootings on the homes of Democratic officials.

title: Illinois Gov. Pritzker signs new law upping vetting for police hires
shortDescription: Illinois State Sen. Doris Turner said the act will determine "necessary guardrails to ensure we have good officers on our streets."
